review: No, unfortunately, it did not meet my expectations.  Everything to which the Fire TV Stick gave us access we could already get through our cable and Wii boxes.  The only difference was that using Fire TV costs premium amounts for what we were already getting for free.  I returned the item.
author: Pam Lynn Moore

review: So far we are very happy with the fire stick. It works great for ordering new movies and we love all the selection from Amazon prime and Netflix.
author: Anne Levy

review: Easy to set up and use
author: Tom Stewart

review: My family is loving the Fire Stick.  I didn't realize how easy it was.  I would definitely recommend this to those who like to watch TV series but without the commercials.
author: D.K.

review: Best investMent I've ever made. Disconnect cable. Keep Internet. Hello fire stick. I rarely watch tv. It's mainly for my 3 year old to watch cartoons. In which it has everything she watches. If u stay on "prime tv" it's all free. It will show u what is available if u are a prime member. You'd be stupid NOT to subscribe to prime. But that's just my opinion. I love it and I've gotten 2 others to drop their providers and go to strictly this too. '
author: Terika Reed

review: Good product, just what i expected.
author: Angrymrs
